name: voting-redux
description: A React app where one can browse existing polls as well as sign up and login to vote or create new polls.

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && cd client && rm -rf node_modules/ && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules/ && cd ..
scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.resetup: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run setup && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd server && now
